title: Pamphlet, The Push Pin Monthly Graphic Number 32 / How to Lead a Weapons Platoon, 1961
title_raw: The Push Pin Monthly Graphic Number 32 / How to Lead a Weapons Platoon
medium: Offset lithograph in black and white on heavy glossy white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted on inside back cover, publication information: The Weaver Organization [lithographers], Photo-Lettering, Weltz Ad Service [typography], Dick Farkas / Photography Broker, and Push Pin Studios
description: Four f. (2 sheets); on cover: photographic reproduction of old-fashioned archery target with concentric circles, on painted distressed wood; imprinted on title page in facture-style typography: How to  / Lead a / Weapons / Platoon; inside pages, point-by-point actual advise from an army training manual on weapons platoons, each illustrated in style of cover image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pamphlet, The Push Pin Monthly Graphic Number 32 / How to Lead a Weapons Platoon, 1961. Offset lithograph in black and white on heavy glossy white wove paper. 
Gift of Seymour Chwast. 1998-74-7
